EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING
   ASSISTANCE IN 33-09N 012-31E.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
   KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1864/15.
